captions.text: BuzzFeed presents How Do Girls Flirt?
- I think flirting is so dumb.
- But it definitely is a thing
that people have or they don't have.
- I wouldn't say I'm good at flirting.
- I am excellent at flirting.

Smiling, leaning forward
and touching someone,

and making eye contact can
suggest romantic interest
- Eye contact is big.
It's the first intention of like,
"Oh, I'm kind of into you."

- When someone starts
to turn their head away,
but their eyes stay looking at you.

- You don't want to look like
you're just staring at them,
and then they're going to be like,
"Do I have something on my face?"
- Smiling a lot, "smizing," if you will.

- The key to flirting is
to making the person feel
like they're the only person in the room.

- The movies has taught you
that you do a little wink

and you flip your hair, but I
would never do that (laughs).

You saw how awkward that was
(laughs), like "What is this?"
- (laughs) Does that do anything for you?

- Then, I'm like, "Okay, maybe
I should stand more straight.
"No, they're going to think I'm too tall.
"No, okay."
- When I'm flirting with someone,
my posture is the best it's ever been.
My ballet teacher would be so proud.
- 'Cuz I'm supposed to have my chest out,
and I'm supposed to, like, "hi."

- Oh, this is what's so funny
about having small boobs

is they'll still do it,
but I'll feel dumb doing it

'cuz it's sort of like,
"And here is my necklace!"
- Touch is a really great easy flirt,

and you just kind of put
your hand on their shoulder.

- I do a lot of hand on
the small of the back,
which is typically a guy move.
- But I feel like usually it comes off
as like I'm trying to grab their ass,

so I'm like, "Eh," and they're
just like, "Whoa, girl."
A survey by Jdate and Christian Mingle
found that 33% of women find it
easier to ask someone on a date
via text than by calling them

- Texting is definitely
a large part of flirting.
- So less is more, though,
when you're first texting with someone.
- Aloof is key.
- I think emojis are really flirty.
- Where she's blowing you a heart kiss.
- Poop emoji, boom, thinking of you.
The smiling poop. (laughs)
- The little smirk face where you're like,
"Yeah, I just said something dirty.
"What are you going to do about it?"

- The ghost keeps him
guessing, and, also, how cute.

- The peach emoji is the
sexiest one for sure.

- Social media was invented
to flirt, in my opinion.
That's all I use it for.
- Casually liking one or two photos.
- He's going to post one that he thinks
everyone's going to like.
Don't like that one, but two weeks later,

you'll come in with a
"like" when he only has 10.
Push it to 11.
You'll get married.
- If I were to give advice to someone
who is totally clueless about flirting,
I would say, "Welcome to the club."

- If you're awkward and
weird, be awkward and weird,

and it will be flirty in
exactly the right way.

- You're like, "Just, like,
go for it and just be direct."
- There such a stigma for girls

that you shouldn't make
the first move in that way

or go up to the guy, but
the worst that could happen

is they turn you down, and
that's not the end of the world.

- Make your flirts have
some sort of end game.
Otherwise, why are we on this bleak earth?
- I'd rather regret something I did do

than something I didn't
do, so just go do it.
Music: Voices of Spring
Warner / Chappell Production Music
How Do Guys Flirt?
For even more wonderful things
subscribe to BuzzFeed Yellow
Subscribe

comments.text:
I feel like, 1. This is easy coming from Buzzfeed's ridiculously attractive 
staff. Like, if anyone of these women did any of those things to me I'd 
probably  get on my knees and scream "I VOLUNTEER AS TRIBUTE!" as loud as 
possible. 2. When it comes to regular women, I swear they either choose to 
be as subtle as humanly fucking possible or just don't do it at all. 3. 
It's not something that's hard. Like that biting your bottom lip thing, or 
touching our hands or faces or that underhanded compliment like 'Aw, that's 
so cute, I like a guy who's a good sibling' (I mean, you're supposed to be 
a good sibling, but compliment us on the obvious things we do right) and 
it's good. Done. Like guys are like "Awww you're so pretty, you wanna go 
out, you have a pretty name I WOULD DRAG MY DICK ACROSS SAND PAPER WHILE 
HOMELESS KIDS THREW BUCKETS OF ACID AT MY FACE JUST TO GET COFFEEE WITH 
YOU" to girls who don't like us and we get nothing because all the girls we 
don't notice are flirting with us have moved on to other guys.﻿

My hands are swollen with want, there’s not one inch of your body I
